ygData.subject: Re: I'm crying on the inside
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry, but i think that s bullshit.  Show me where i can make 125pp, or whatever the going rate for a tomahawk, in 3hrs or whenever he spawns. I m level 20
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 May 1999, Jim Peterson wrote:

> Wow. Too emotional man. Just saying that realistically in the game,
> you have to gang up to camp. Sorry that you're a loner. My guild needs to be equipped too you know. None of my members are below 18th level, so it's not bad twinking, we just want a piece of the pie and camping an area is the only way to do it. If you want a specific item and can't find buddies to help you camp, raise money and buy it. Logistically, raising enough money for a item takes just as much time, plus you get xp. That's how a player driven economy works.

Sorry, but i think that's bullshit. Show me where i can make 125pp, or
whatever the going rate for a tomahawk, in 3hrs or whenever he spawns. I'm
level 20 and usually fight in halfway decent cash areas, but between the
group, in 3 hours, we usually make only about 8 to 10 plat each. Get your
guild OUT of the area and go hunt in dungeons and do shit like you're
supposed to do. I'm in the Bloodstone Templars, on the Solusek Ro server,
and we do not camp shit for our lower members. If we find anyone
partaking in such dishonorable activities, they risk getting kicked from
the guild. We DO, however, enjoy going together as a group to obtain the
items and move on. Why can't your guild be noble and do the same?

Nick

Frizzan Z`ress (Bloodstone Templars)
Solusek Ro
Ingido Brotherhood Twentieth Level
